resources.string: Use keyword matching to intercept notifications\nDeveloper: 忆清鸣、luckyzyx
Developer: 忆清鸣、luckyzyx\nUnauthorized handling and reprinting are prohibited without the authorization of the developer
Intercept according to the comparison between the input characters and the notification, when the notification contains this keyword or sentence, it will be intercepted\n\n
Shorter characters may block other notifications, so be sure to enter correct text or sentences\n\n
Note: After switching the system language, you must reset the blocking keyword, otherwise it may be invalid
Are you sure you want to remove this notification?
